name: tribute (twsau)
description:
Tribute, from the Latin tributum, meaning "a thing contributed or paid". The river contributes to the sea...

If that doesn't float your boat, it's a tribute to low resolution games.

All sprites are original. I wrote the music a while ago but rewrote it for this using a great tool called beepbox.

Hope you like it! Check out my website (I need a job).
